item.description:
We'll be meeting in the lobby of the Museum of Science to get tickets for a free screening of the IMAX movie, "Adrenaline Rush." This can be considered part of the lead-in festivities for Darwin Day on February 12th, a moment for all of us to come together in enthusiastic celebration of science and all the neat stuff we can do with it.

This is a family-friendly event.

Assistant Organizer Julie (http://www.meetup.com...) will be on hand to meet people in the lobby beforehand, and will help get the ball roll after the show for a possible pub excursion.

About the free movie series:
http://mos.org/events...

About "Adrenaline Rush":
http://www.mos.org/ex...
item.name: Free Science IMAX Movie Night: "Adrenaline Rush"
